articles.title: Machine Learning in R
articles.contents:
Efficient, object-oriented programming on the building blocks of machine learning.





A well designed and easy to learn interface.





More than 100 connected machine learning algorithms.





Light on dependencies.





Quick parallelization with the future package.





State-of-the-art optimization algorithms.





Dataflow programming with pipelines.



 GitHub  Mattermost  Twitter  StackOverflow

Quick Start
The mlr3verse meta-package installs mlr3 and some of the most important extension packages:


install.packages("mlr3verse")



Basic Example


library(mlr3)

# retrieve task
task = tsk("penguins")

# load learner and set hyperparameter
learner = lrn("classif.rpart", cp = .01)

# automatic resampling
resampling = rsmp("cv", folds = 3L)
rr = resample(task, learner, resampling)

# set measure and score
measure = msr("classif.acc")
rr$score(measure)



Tuning Example


library(mlr3tuning)
library(mlr3tuningspaces)

# retrieve task
task = tsk("penguins")

# load learner and set search space
learner = lts(lrn("classif.rpart"))

# hyperparameter tuning on the penguins data set
instance = tune(
  method = "random_search",
  task = task,
  learner = learner,
  resampling = rsmp("cv", folds = 3),
  measure = msr("classif.acc"),
  term_evals = 10,
  batch_size = 5
)

# best performing hyperparameter configuration
instance$result



Pipelines Example


library(mlr3)
library(mlr3pipelines)
library(mlr3learners)

# retrieve task
task = tsk("german_credit")

# set base and super learner
base_learners = list(
  lrn("classif.rpart", predict_type = "prob"),
  lrn("classif.kknn", predict_type = "prob")
)
super_learner = lrn("classif.log_reg")

# create pipeline and convert to graph learner
graph_stack = pipeline_stacking(base_learners, super_learner)
graph_learner = as_learner(graph_stack)

# train on german credit task
graph_learner$train(task)



Citing mlr3
If you use mlr3, please cite our JOSS article:

articles.title: Packages
articles.contents:
Core



mlr3 

Basic building blocks for machine learning.



mlr3verse 

Meta-package for installing and using core mlr3 packages.


 Optimization



bbotk 

Black-box optimization toolkit.



paradox 

Universal parameter space description and tools.



mlr3tuning 

Hyperparameter tuning.



mlr3hyperband 

Adds hyperband optimization to mlr3tuning.



mlr3mbo 

Adds model-based optimization to mlr3tuning.



miesmuschel 

Adds flexible mixed integer evolutionary strategies.



mlr3tuningspaces 

Collection of search spaces for hyperparameter tuning.


 Feature Selection



mlr3filters 

Filter feature selection.



mlr3fselect 

Wrapper feature selection.


 Data



mlr3db 

Data backend to transparently work with databases.



mlr3oml 

Connector to OpenML.



mlr3data 

Additional data sets and tasks.


 Learners



mlr3learners 

Essential learners for mlr3, maintained by the mlr-org team.



mlr3extralearners 

Extra learners for mlr3, implemented by the community.



mlr3keras 

Deep learning via keras.


 Visualization



mlr3viz 

Visualizations for tasks, predictions, resample results and benchmarks.


 Pipelines



mlr3pipelines 

Dataflow programming toolkit.


 Tasks



mlr3spatiotempcv 

Spatiotemporal resampling and visualization methods.



mlr3cluster 

Cluster analysis.



mlr3proba 

Toolkit for making probabilistic predictions.



mlr3ordinal 

Ordinal regression.



mlr3multioutput 

Storing and working with multi-output tasks.



mlr3temporal 

Time series analysis.



mlr3spatial 

Methods for spatial objects.


 Utilities



mlr3misc 

Miscellaneous helper functions.



mlr3measures 

Performance measures for supervised learning.



mlr3benchmark 

Analysis and tools for benchmarking.



mlr3fairness 

Machine learning fairness.



mlr3batchmark 

Connector between mlr3 and batchtools.

articles.title: Resources
articles.contents:
General
We started writing a book. This should be the central entry point to the package.
The mlr3gallery has some case studies and demonstrates how frequently occurring problems can be solved. It is still in early days so stay tuned for more to come.
Reference manual
FAQ
Ask questions on Stackoverflow (tag #mlr3)
Extension Learners
Recommended core regression, classification, and survival learners are in mlr3learners
All others are in mlr3extralearners
Use the learner search to get a simple overview
Use the learner status to see their build status

Cheatsheets
Overview of cheatsheets
mlr3
mlr3tuning
mlr3pipelines

Videos:
useR2019 talk on mlr3
useR2019 talk on mlr3pipelines and mlr3tuning
useR2020 tutorial on mlr3, mlr3tuning and mlr3pipelines
Recorded talk about mlr3spatiotempcv and mlr3spatial at OpenDataScience Europe Conference 2021 in Wageningen, NL

Courses/Lectures
The course Introduction to Machine learning (I2ML) is a free and open flipped classroom course on the basics of machine learning. mlr3 is used in the demos and exercises.

Templates/Tutorials
mlr3-learndrake: Shows how to use mlr3 with drake for reproducible ML workflow automation.

List of extension packages
mlr-outreach contains public talks and slides resources.
Our blog about mlr and mlr3. (We are not the most frequent bloggers ;) )
Wiki: Contains mainly information for developers.
